title: What Is Artificial Intelligence? | Introduction To Artificial Intelligence | AI Tutorial|Simplilearn
excerpt: Artificial intelligence is a technique of turning a computer-based robot to work and act like humans. Siri, Alexa, recommendations from companies like Flipkart and Amazon, and self-driving cars like Tesla. All this work is based on AI. There are four types of Artificial Intelligence.
